comment_id.comment: Ross Blanchard resume with core competencies

summary: Results-driven Senior IT Manager with over 25 years of experience in leadership, project management, and technical expertise. Proven track record in IT systems governance, employing ITIL and SLDC best practices, ensuring InfoSec and SOX compliance, and driving business efficiency through value-based outcomes.

compliance.label: Compliance & Security Expertise
items: Enterprise Systems Security with SOC2 and/or ISO 27001
Risk Management (DR, BRP, Data backup and archiving)
Federal Lending Regulations (TILA, ECOA, CRA, HMDA)

platformsApplications.label: Platforms & Applications Governance
items: Salesforce (Experience, Service, Sales, and CPQ/Revenue Clouds; Field Service Lightning, Scheduler, Voice)
Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Trello, StatusPage, JSM, Assets)
Microsoft (M365 Copilot, SharePoint, Azure, and Office Suite)
Data and Integrations (Informatica, MSSQL, Postgres, Oracle, Postman, API Contracts)

experience.title: Senior Manager, Information Technology
responsibilities: Led a global remote team in implementing strategic application enhancements, IT compliance/security, and system best practices for multiple Salesforce.com orgs, learning management systems, and contract lifecycle management software
Optimized IT systems to increase efficiency, security, and disaster prevention/readiness across the organization
Maintained SOX Compliance through stringent team practices and close management oversight
Employed best practices for SLDC and DevOps change management
Implemented robust observability across the organization
Managed integrations with multiple enterprise applications

experience.title: Manager, Enterprise IT Systems
responsibilities: Managed a team of 10 IT systems experts supporting and enhancing enterprise solutions including CRM, ERP, collaboration, and data platforms
Ensured IT system compliance with organizational standards and regulations
Employed ITIL best practices
Performed ERP, CRM, and other SaaS enterprise systems governance
Recruited and retained high-performers, mentored staff, helped grow the team's expertise and value

experience.title: Technical Project Manager, QA Manager, Scrum Master
responsibilities: Program and project management for B2B2C retail financing/leasing software, merchant services solutions, and API integrations
Managed iOS point of sale software and psychometric assessment software for human resource teams
Introduced Agile practices by re-configuring and administering collaboration tools; managing sprints; refining team processes
Improved customer service through service desk software integration with issue tracking system
Implemented document/knowledge management
Coached service team leads on troubleshooting and problem management

experience.title: Vice President, IT Systems Manager
responsibilities: Liaison for CIO and seven enterprise divisions: Marketing, Communications, Human Resources, Real Estate/Facilities, Strategic Sourcing, Cultural Enhancement, and Financial Pacific Equipment Leasing
Managed a team of systems analysts and engineers to design, deploy, support, and administer multiple enterprise-level software solutions
Shaped customer technology service demands by aligning services with business needs through incident resolution, service request fulfillment, problem management, and new project initiation
Ensured customer satisfaction by maintaining relationships with and between internal business units, technology service groups, and external vendors to fulfill the needs of the business
Continuously improved service by conducting routine service reviews and process evaluations with business units and technology providers, improving quality and gaining efficiency where possible
Lending and Credit systems analysis and development

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Scientific and Technical Communication

volunteerism.title: Director
volunteerism.description: Managed a team of curators in a public space gallery with a focus on community building, showcasing works by Portland artists

volunteerism.title: Board of Directors
volunteerism.description: Provided educators with resources for teaching economics in Oregon schools

volunteerism.title: Vice Chairman and Charter Member
volunteerism.organization: Harland Financial Solutions Software Advisory Panel
